p: MSCs were cultured as described by Boo et. al. (2011) 10. Briefly, 2 mL of bone marrow was diluted with Phosphate buffered saline (PBS) solution (1:2) before being loaded onto 3 mL Ficoll-paque (GE Healthcare-Amersham Biosciences, Piscataway, NJ). Mononuclear cells were then harvested from the interface of plasma and Ficoll-paque after being centrifuged at 500 g for 25 minutes. The cells were cultured for 14 days in DMEM containing 10% FBS and 1% PS at 37Â°C in a humidified incubator containing 5% CO 2.. .
